p: At the end of the study, the female volunteers were asked to evaluate the overall satisfaction regarding the sensation given by both hydro-alcoholic extracts on skin, by using the following score: 0—not satisfied, 1—partially satisfied, 2—satisfied, and 3—very satisfied, respectively. As shown in Figure 6, the satisfaction scores of OBHE hydro-alcoholic extract were higher than the OBAE hydro-alcoholic extract (57.14% vs. 42.85%, p < 0.05). Following applications of both hydro-alcoholic basil extracts, no adverse reactions were observed.
